my whole life is different high school i skipped it right around fifteen i knew that i was gifted self-taught home school specific simplistic my characteristic holistic a mystic everything to me is encrypted imbued with the same wind energy that be flowing from my spirit those that have ears to hear hear it theres no excuse if theres a free library and you dont go near it me i seek the truth others they fear it they living in the mansions im living in the spirit that negativity i will clear it that productivity i will share it with all who will hear it you see now that i exist and can never be told that hip-hop was about silver and gold with the mic i hold or held i try to elevate beyond whatever soul or cell yo i sound odd but you know about that camel that needle the rich man in the kingdom of god bring the real many bring the façade them bells in your head yeah im ringing them hard
